display_long_description:
# Welcome to **ARTO** 
– a creative VR playground that blends **art, relaxation, and fun**.  
Whether you're here to relax or to create like a pro, **ARTO** gives you the tools to express yourself.

Explore **10 unique, themed scenes** and use **over 1200 templates** and **500 decals** to bring your ideas to life.  
Relax with **mandalas**, try **mirror drawing**, or shoot colorful decals in vibrant worlds. It's intuitive, playful, and made for everyone.

[media]

Save your creations with ease and share them with just a few taps.  
From **360° screenshots** to **full canvas exports**, **ARTO** makes it simple to show your work to the world.

---

**Key Features:**  
• **Drawing crayon** and **line tool**  
• **1200+ templates** and **500+ decals**  
• **Mirror drawing**, **mandalas**, and **drawing spheres**  
• **Undo/redo** (25 steps), **save/load system**  
• **Standing** & **seated** play modes  
• **Movable ladders** and **stepladders**  
• **10 stylized scenes** and **8 curated music playlists**  
• **Gallery scene** to present your work  
• **Canvas export**, **scene screenshot**, and **360° screenshot**  
• **Easy sharing options**

[media]

**Create. Explore. Inspire.**  
— *The ARTO Team*
